thread.title: Nanakuroadie
thread.title_full: Wiggle.jp について 投稿者 Nanakuroadie

author: Nanakuroadie
title: Nanakuroadie
text: Purchased Castelli's Winter Windstopper Jacket. Almost 60% discount from regular price and it was really a good buy. I have another Castelli Jacket which costed me US$350, and the new one was less than one third in price. Very stylish blue colour jacket and very comfortable. It took almost 2 weeks for the jacket to arrive in my house. So I rated 4 stars this time. I am trully satisfied.
